item.description:
The Nashua Telegraph sponsors a karaoke competition annually.

The 4 preliminary contests are held on 4 Tues. evenings at 4 different locations in the Nashua area.

This is the last of those 4 nights.

You may compete all 4 nights to try to qualify for the finals.

Registration to compete starts at 7 PM.

The contest begins promptly at 8 PM.

Registration to compete costs $5.

There is no cover charge to watch.

You can compete as an individual or as a duet but not both.

You don't have to arrive as early as 7, BUT from past experience I know that the venues will be crowded, so the earlier you arrive, the better so it will be easier to try to find seating together. No guarantees about seating! And please don't leave a YES RSVP if you can't make it. People will be upset if we try to save extra space when other people are desperate for seats.

http://www.nashuatelegraph.com/superstar for contest details.

3 finalists are chosen by judges and 1 by text message vote for each preliminary.

I am listing this event with several meetup groups.
item.name: Karaoke Contest
